title: raritycheck
author: raritycheck
created_time: August 06, 2023, 09:42:18 PMLast edit: September 14, 2023, 07:56:22 PM by raritycheck
content: Addresses are hereThere are four coins.- Two are loadable and two are unloadableCoin details and pricing:Silver loadable:Material: .999 Fine Silver Finish: ProofDiameter: 34.9mm    Weight: 25 grams  Diameter: 34.9 mm  Quantity: Limited to 100Engraved serial number: YesPrice: 299 USD  ONLY (excluding loading the coin with 0.01BTC)Coins available for sale: 2 until 99 Alloy loadable:Material: Zinc AlloyPlating:  SilverFinish: Proof Diameter: 34.9 mmQuantity: Limited to 200Engraved serial number: YesPrice: 129 USD  ONLY (excluding loading the coin with 0.001BTC)Coins available for sale: 2 until 199Silver unloadable:Material: .999 Fine Silver Finish: ProofDiameter: 34.9mm    Weight: 24 grams  Diameter: 34.9 mm Engraved serial number: NoPrice: 199 USD  ONLY  Quantity: Limited to 100Coins available for sale: 90Alloy unloadable:Material: Zinc AlloyPlating:  SilverDesign: Embossing both sidesFinish: ProofDiameter 34.9 mmPrice: 99 USD  ONLY Engraved serial number: NoQuantity: Limited to 200Coins available for sale: 190Happy Collecting  Back story:Inspired by Satoshi Nakamoto's notion that "a lost bitcoin is a donation to everyone else," we sought to embody this idea tangibly. We created a groundbreaking coin with a hole at its core, symbolising the potential collective benefit from lost coins. ----- Coins sold so farSilverCoin #3Coin #15Coin #16Coin #19Coin #24Coin #33Coin #52Coin #53 AlloyCoin #03Coin #15Coin #16Coin #19Coin #21Coin #23Coin #30Coin #33Coin #52Coin #53Coin #55Coin #69Coin #77Coin #99Coin #100Coin #111

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: cool design and interesting hologram. Could you show one without the holo and how the private key fits? Oops. I looked again and see you actually did this in one of the photos...

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: I would love to get 4 of these .If possible here are the  #s I’m interested in with a few backup #s they are in order from what I would choose first)(I’m not sure if you have created sets yet so my request my be a little premature)#3#7#33#82#69Love the look of these ,  would like to have “not DIY” kind.Thank you so much

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Congratulations!  Awesome looking coins and unique design I may say!   Reminds me of ancient Chinese coins with holes in the middle. Was this the inspiration behind yours?   Love the concept....goodluck with the sales!

comments.author: raritycheck
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on August 15, 2023, 09:01:09 AM  Congratulations!  Awesome looking coins and unique design I may say!   Reminds me of ancient Chinese coins with holes in the middle. Was this the inspiration behind yours?   Love the concept....goodluck with the sales!Thank you for the kind words. You are very supportive.

comments.author: Mitchell
comments.body: The coin looks amazing, but the price is a bit high IMO. Is that because of the production costs to make such a piece + holo?

comments.author: Bullion-n-BTC
comments.body: Would love to have one of the silver fundable ones bro but she’s a little out of my price range at the moment

comments.author: raritycheck
comments.body: Quote from: Mitchell on August 17, 2023, 02:16:43 PMThe coin looks amazing, but the price is a bit high IMO. Is that because of the production costs to make such a piece + holo?Yes. It was a really expensive (time and money)  process of 9 months and had to pay extra as coins kept breaking. Had to change design 15 times. Had to return coins multiple times. At this price we are at loss.  Plus three different trials with stickers. As stickers won’t fit. Overall it’s a 3x more effort than Vibyor orange coins. Originally we want to keep the cost as 499usd. But we are hoping if we sell all we can make money from version 2. Lots of costs involved. We also want to do custom capsules but no more time.RegardsTeam RC

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Interesting / unique coin design for sure. As kid my favourite kind of coins where these (Chinese?) Yen coins with "mysterious" symbols and a hole in the middle.Quote from: raritycheck on August 17, 2023, 02:59:13 PMQuote from: Mitchell on August 17, 2023, 02:16:43 PMThe coin looks amazing, but the price is a bit high IMO. Is that because of the production costs to make such a piece + holo?Yes. It was a really expensive (time and money)  process of 9 months and had to pay extra as coins kept breaking. Had to change design 15 times. Had to return coins multiple times. At this price we are at loss.  Plus three different trials with stickers. As stickers won’t fit. Overall it’s a 3x more effort than Vibyor orange coins. Originally we want to keep the cost as 499usd. But we are hoping if we sell all we can make money from version 2. Lots of costs involved. We also want to do custom capsules but no more time.RegardsTeam RCI was wondering about the production process, not too suprised production costs were so high with lots of trial and error. This one's not within my budget range for a new coin.

comments.body: Would be in for 1 alloy loadable. If possible #24 or #101 please sire Thanks,JamboEdit: I missed the load values and would prefer silver now with the higher load. #24 or lowest available if possible. Sorry for the mix up

comments.author: raritycheck
comments.body: Quote from: Eclipse33 on August 21, 2023, 05:11:08 PMHello RC, These are the best coins I have seen you release thus far. The inner punchout is an innovation I have not seen before. Very nice work all around on these. Thank you Eclipse.Coming from you, this praise is a huge deal for us. Your support and motivating thoughts mean a lot.RegardsTeam RC

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: RC Nice work. You are building a great resume of designed coins. Also, they are selling well on the secondary market. QuoteAlloy loadable:Material: Zinc AlloyPlating:  SilverFinish: ProofDiameter: 34.9 mmQuantity: Limited to 200Engraved serial number: YesPrice: 129 USD  ONLY (excluding loading the coin with 0.01BTC)Coins available for sale: 2 until 199Question. Is the Alloy Loadable coin loaded with .01BTC or with .001BTC? The details say ..01 but the pics make me think it is .001. Thanks for letting me know.

comments.body: Got mine in the other day, coin looks awesome! Glad I ended up grabbing the higher denomination silver coin. I really need a display case for all my physical at this point. Too much nice stuff to throw in the safe and not look at lmao
